title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398Accessibility problems I needto first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (eg. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame.
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: We should be starting the Help view in a way that allows immediate navigation via the keyboard.
SR: To reproduce the issue, launch the Help view on Windows 2000 platform (Win2K), and try to navigate using the tab key.
